summary: Set in a world of iron dirigibles and steam powered computers, this gothic horror mystery tells the story of Jasper Morello, a disgraced aerial navigator who flees his plague-ridden home on a desperate voyage to redeem himself.
cast: Joel Edgerton|Helmut Bakaitis|Tommy Dysart|Jude Beaumont|Richard Moss|Lewis Fiander
title: The Mysterious Geographic Explorations of Jasper Morello
